薌.definition: aromatic herb used for seasoning; variant of 香[xiang1]

薌劇.definition: variety of opera popular in southern Fujian and Taiwan

薌城.definition: Xiangcheng district of Zhangzhou city 漳州市[Zhang1 zhou1 shi4], Fujian

薌城區.definition: Xiangcheng district of Zhangzhou city 漳州市[Zhang1 zhou1 shi4], Fujian
